alert.note: Alert for Bolivar; Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 11:28PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sunflower and southeastern Bolivar Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1128 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pace, or 7 miles southeast of Rosedale, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Renova around 1145 PM CDT. Cleveland and Boyle around 1150 PM CDT. Shaw around 1200 AM CDT. Blaine around 1220 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for north central and northwestern Mississippi.
